alert.note: Alert for Inland Georgetown (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 5:08PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Georgetown County through 600 PM EDT... At 508 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oatland, or 12 miles northwest of Georgetown, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plantersville and Oatland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
